Hanging scroll with calligraphy on it ("We put a priority on entertainment")
kDesc
Hanging scroll with "We put a priority on entertainment" written in forceful calligraphy.[#Legal]
Parchemin suspendu avec "Nous faisons passer l'amusement en priorité" écrit d'un trait énergique.[#Legal]
Hängende Papierrolle, auf der "Unterhaltung ist unsere Priorität" mit kräftigen Pinselstrichen geschrieben steht.[#Legal]
Rotolo con la frase "Priorità al divertimento" scritta con pennellate energiche.[#Legal]
Pergamino colgante con el texto "Nuestra prioridad es el entretenimiento" escrito con una caligrafía poderosa.[#Legal]
筆文字で力強く「おもしろさ優先主義」と書かれた掛け軸。[#Legal]
붓글씨로 힘 있게 「재미 우선 주의」라고 쓰여진 족자. [#Legal]
Japanese wall scroll in which "Omoshirosa yuusensyugi" (Fun is the first consideration) is written on it with force by ink brush.[#Legal]
以毛筆渾勁寫上「樂趣優先主義」字樣的掛軸。[#Legal]
以毛筆渾勁寫上「樂趣優先主義」字樣的掛軸。[#Legal]
Hanging scroll with "We put a priority on entertainment" written in forceful calligraphy.[#Legal]
